title: Augusta County: Jonathan M. Shipman to Kenton Harper, June 11, 1860
summary: Lieut. Jonathan M. Shipman writes his Col Kenton Harper to complain that his captain, Capt. O. H. Lumay, has been deficient in his duty to his company. Col Kenton Harper dismisses the charges in a note at the end.
keywords: Military Authority, Death/Casualties, American Civil War
